languages.text: "Реликвия... Сама мысль об осквернении ее — кощунство. Сама вероятность — грех".

traits.locale_text: {n}На мгновение Претор умолкает.{/n} "Сам я презрел смерть, не страшит она меня. Но монастырь и жрецы — дети мои возлюбленные. Разве может родитель обрекать дитя на смерть?"

languages.text: "The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is a blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sacrilege."
languages.original_text: "Реликвия... Сама мысль об осквернении ее — кощунство. Сама вероятность — грех".

traits.locale_text: "The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sin."
"The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sin."
"The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is a blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sacrilege."

"The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is a blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sacrilege."
"The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is a blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sacrilege."

languages.text: "Das Relikt ... Allein der Gedanke an seine Entweihung ist Blasphemie. Die bloße Chance ist ein Sakrileg."
languages.original_text: "The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is a blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: "Das Relikt ... Allein der Gedanke an seine Entweihung ist Blasphemie. Die bloße Chance ist ein Sakrileg."

languages.text: « La relique... La seule pensée de sa profanation est un blasphème et la moindre chance qu'elle advienne, un sacrilège. »
languages.original_text: "The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is a blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: « La relique... La seule pensée de sa profanation est un blasphème et la moindre chance qu'elle advienne, un sacrilège. »

languages.text: “神圣遗物……光是产生玷污它的想法，就可以称之为亵渎，更不用提放任它面临被玷污的风险。”
languages.original_text: "The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is a blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: “神圣遗物……光是产生玷污它的想法，就可以称之为亵渎，更不用提放任它面临被玷污的风险。”

languages.text: 「遺物…遺物を冒涜するなど、そう考えることすら悍ましい。それに手をかけようとするなど神聖冒涜もはなはだしい」
languages.original_text: "The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is a blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: 「遺物…遺物を冒涜するなど、考えることすらおこがましい。手をかけようとするなど神聖冒涜もはなはだしい」

languages.text: «La reliquia... La mera idea de su profanación es una blasfemia. La mera posibilidad es un sacrilegio».
languages.original_text: "The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is a blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: «La reliquia... La mera idea de su profanación es una blasfemia. La mera posibilidad es un sacrilegio».

languages.text: "Yadigâr... Ona hürmetsizlik etme düşüncesi bile dine aykırılıktır. Bunu icraata dökmek ise imanımıza yapılan en büyük küfürdür."
languages.original_text: "The relic... The mere thought of its desecration is a blasphemy. The mere chance of it is a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: "Yadigâr... Ona hürmetsizlik etme düşüncesi bile günahtır. Bunu icraata dökmek ise imanımıza yapılan en büyük küfürdür."
